title: Profile Button will not Load
body: I'm honestly at my wit's end, it's been happening for 2 weeks or so. After using the client for a while it will stop letting me click on people profiles, go to store or crafting center. I can only play a game. It's incredibly frustrating because I have to exit the client completely so that everything will work again. Help?

replies.body:
Do you get a specific error message, or do the buttons stop functioning entirely? Since these are all on different server locales, this could be caused by an unstable connection to the servers. We've consolidated the most common solutions for this in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I recommend starting there.

Let me know if you continue to have issues with this.
